#include<iostream>
#include<math.h>
using namespace std;

long long pr(long long a, long long b)
{
	if(b==1)
		return a;
	else if(b==2)
		return (a*a)%1000000007;
	else if (b%2==0)
	{
		long long f = pr(a,b/2);
		return (f*f)%1000000007;
	}
	else
	{
		long long f = pr(a,(b-1)/2);
		return (a*((f*f)%1000000007))%1000000007;
	}
}

int main()
{
	long long t, l, length, i, j, s, p, diff, x, c, y;
	string st;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
    {
		cin>>l>>st;
		length = st.size();
		int z[length];
	    for(j=0;j<length;j++)
	    {
	    	z[j] = (int)(st[j]-'a'+1);
		}
	    p = 1;
    	s = 0;
    	c = 1; 
    	for(i=0;i<min(l,length);i++)
        {
        	c = p;
			p = (p*z[i])%1000000007;
        	s = (s+p)%1000000007;
        }
        diff = l-length;
        if(diff>0)
        {
		   	x = (p-1+1000000007)%1000000007;
    		y = ((pr(26,diff)-1+1000000007)*x)%1000000007;
    		s = (s+(((26*y)%1000000007)*pr(25,1000000005)))%1000000007;	
    	}
    	if(diff>=0)
    		s = (s-1+1000000007)%1000000007;
	    cout<<s<<"\n";
	}
	return 0;
}
